thread.title: Sony cuts PS4 prices in U.S. and Canada, announces holiday lineup
thread.title_full: Sony cuts PS4 prices in U.S. and Canada, announces holiday lineup

title: Sony cuts PS4 prices in U.S. and Canada, announces holiday lineup
text:
Sony cuts PS4 prices in U.S. and Canada, announces holiday lineup 
Published By: Gamasutra.com - Today 
Sony has dropped the price of its flagship console in the U.S and Canada in preparation for the holidays.
